Name: Shaverma: Ravshan Edition
About the game: Have you ever thought about what happens inside a regular eatery? Or what way are people to qualify to work as a cook in chaveroche? Ravshan! Put on your apron, my hands and get to work! In the game you have to become an assistant to the owner of the van with the Shawarma, you will cut and chop vegetables, which will fly everywhere. React with lightning speed and dissect them with the mouse! In the game you will operate a knife by means of a mouse and you will need to cut vegetables. Thus it is necessary not to pass them. Prove that you can withstand all the tests and become an employee in the catering! feature of game Exciting levels that will not make you bored High-quality and beautiful graphics Suitable for children and adults Great background music
